title: Ring of Resilience
description: Challenge yourself on the Ring of Resilience, a circular route around Yishun Ring Road that tests your endurance and determination. It’s more than just a run—it’s a journey to discover your inner strength. Lace up, hit the ring, and let your resilience shine!
author: Wei Shen

commentsList.name: Tom
commentsList.text: Loved the scenic views! @Zhong Yan, I challenge you to run 100 rounds around it!

commentsList.name: Zhong Yan
commentsList.text: This is so amazing! Thank you for this fun challenge @Tom, I'm gonna run 100 rounds around it tomorrow!

title: Dino Dash: Punggol Edition
description: Tackle the Dino Dash: Punggol Edition, a unique route shaped like a dinosaur. Trace the curves of this prehistoric path and let its playful design fuel your run. Lace up and conquer this one-of-a-kind trail!
author: Jane Doe

title: Marina Bay Loop
description: Run around the iconic Marina Bay area, where the skyline meets the sea. This loop offers scenic views and is perfect for both tourists and locals looking to experience the beauty of Singapore.
author: Alex Tan

title: Botanic Gardens Trail
description: Escape the city and run through the lush greenery of the Botanic Gardens. The perfect route for nature lovers seeking peace and quiet.
author: Maria Lee

title: East Coast Park Stretch
description: Run alongside the beach with the sound of the waves as your companion. The East Coast Park stretch is perfect for long-distance runners and offers beautiful coastal views.
author: Samuel Ng

commentsList.name: Daniel
commentsList.text: A bit long, but the view is worth it!

title: Mount Faber Challenge
description: Conquer the Mount Faber ascent, a challenging uphill run that rewards you with breathtaking views of the city at the top.
author: David Lim

title: Sentosa Island Loop
description: Enjoy a scenic run around the beautiful Sentosa Island. This loop offers both adventure and relaxation with the perfect blend of nature and resorts.
author: Megan Tan

commentsList.name: Leo
commentsList.text: A fun run through the island!

title: Punggol Waterway
description: Run along the scenic Punggol Waterway, where nature and urban life coexist in harmony. A great spot for families and leisure runners.
author: Jason Wong

title: Jurong Lake Gardens Jog
description: Jog through the tranquil Jurong Lake Gardens, where lush greenery and the calm waters of the lake offer a peaceful running experience.
author: Sophia Goh

title: Coney Island Expedition
description: Venture out to Coney Island and explore its wild, untamed nature. This route is perfect for runners seeking a bit of adventure off the beaten path.
author: Henry Chua
